content: this is the most comfortable poncho you will ever crochet now available in english or danish it is crafted using the virus stitch pattern and you can make it in four sizes toddler 2t-4t child small regular adult and large adult use a hook and yarn you love and grab this pattern i suggest using a lighter yarn like red heart unforgettable it is what i would consider more of a baby weight or category 3 yarn this way your poncho is super flowing soft and flexible thicker yarns like the super saver may not react the same way but experiment that s the fun of crafting i m always around for questions send me a personal message and i will return it as soon as i am able thank you for choosing siena s maine design patterns have a lovely crochet day jonna
